website_summaries.verdict: A duo of hydrating facial mists conveniently sold in a two-pack, providing skin with a refreshing and moisturized feeling.
pros: This spray provides a solid alternative for those who don’t like the heaviness of lotion, but are still looking to add moisture to face
Also effective for refreshing skin throughout the day, even over makeup
Comes as a pack of 2 in different scent variations
cons: Sprays have a long ingredient list, which can be off-putting to some buyers

customer_reviews.title: Favorite thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I am not exaggerating when I say this is my absolute, hands down, favorite skin care product of all time! This is perfect for everyone. I love it because I have oily skin and do not need as much moisture as lotion often provides. This is an amazing alternative. Perfect for fresh face and over makeup. Is Mario Badescu married cause hit me up booooooiii!!
customer_reviews.author: grouchosays

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: So when I receive d this product everything was great I had no problems with it. But when I looked at the back of the rose water the directions and lay out of it was not the same as to what the picture shows and what I've seen on other comments that hade pictures. I am concerned that I have received the rose water as a fake but the cucumber one was ok and hade no diffrence.
customer_reviews.author: Elainy

customer_reviews.title: Love them both
customer_reviews.text: Love them both. I use the rose water one to set my makeup. And the green one after my skin care routine. I am in love. And they send me some goodies. As you can see in the pictures they are some samples. Which I appreciate 🙌 Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff, perfect for all skin types!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! I have combo skin, very dry unless I moisturize but also sensitive to becoming oily. I use the rosewater spray after moisturizing as a primer and after I put makeup on as a setting spray. I bring the cucumber spray with me every I go for a quick bit of moisture and as a refresher throughout the day! Absolutely no irritation, I feel like it's brightened up my skin tone since I've been using it. I will be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Stray away from fragrances and dyes.
customer_reviews.text: These products contain fragrances and dyes which are a super duper no-no!! I have bad allergies and a history of mild eczema, but my allergies have caused eczema to flare up around my eyes. What is even worse is I took to these products to HYDRATE my skin. But what really happened is the fragrance in them caused my eyes to completely flare up and become swollen, dry, red, and itchy. Seriously, if you want some actual rose water, Gaia purity Moroccan rose water is the way to go. Don’t damage your beautiful skin with fragrances and dye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was watered down. Once I used all of ...
customer_reviews.text: It was watered down. Once I used all of the spray I bought here on amazon, I went to ULTA to repurchase and could tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product can be used for a variety of things
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth purchase ! I love it ! I use it to prep my skin before makeup and after for setting my makeup , I also just use it on days I don't wear makeup because it helps my skin stay moisturised ! I don't have any complains on this product because it's amazing !
customer_reviews.author: marlenjess

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: The cucumber one is definitely better in my opinion but I love them both. I fimd that the rose one makes my face a little sricky but they have both worked wonders for my face and I noticed an immediate difference. My face is extremely oily and sensitive to my pores being clogged, if I even look at a greasy food the wrong way I break out, but these sprays have not caused any breakouts for me. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie1125

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sprays! At first I didn’t really love the scents but now they are refreshing and even if u don’t love the scents they don’t last very long. Once you spray it the scent is gone within the next 5 minutes. It is so refreshing and hydrating and I love spraying it to wake me up in the morning or relax before I go to sleep! It feels great and clears up your face
customer_reviews.author: Coffeejoey

customer_reviews.title: Love these but the packaging....eh
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I was very upset that my items had not been sealed probably for shipping and we're leaking all over everything else in the box. Thankfully they are natural and didn't ruin anything.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: Little miracle workers!
customer_reviews.text: These sprays are amazing! I had a horrible complexion prior to using these two sprays. I had the tendency to break out badly and have plenty of acne scars and blemishes. These sprays have, after using both every day religiously for about a month, improved my skin tone, refreshed my skin, and evened out my complexion. I'm definitely ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sprays!! I've heard so much about them and wanted to give it a try. I was not disappointed!! I have cystic acne and using this after washingy face morning and night has drastically helped heal my skin and remove red and inflammation
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Such good products. Had to buy again! I live these facial sprays. They are both very refreshing and feel great on my skin. they smell good and really make my face feel hydrated. Works well with or without makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Productjunkie25

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the rose water spray religiously every day and I love it. I wanted to try the cucumber spray since I also heard good things about it, and I needed to replenish my rose water spray. I have to admit that I think I might like the cucumber spray better! It feels more gentle and refreshing, and cooling. Also pro tip, you can use these to spray your beauty blenders for makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will be a repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the rosewater spray for several months now and this is my second purchase of the rosewater spray. I purchased the bundle with the cucumber spray because I wanted to try them and have been loving them. Both are really great for setting my makeup and keeping it looking great all day. If I use them alone, just on bare skin, they feel refreshing and moisturizing, while helping to provide a great base for my next products. I would definitely recommend these to anyone will to try some good products with good ingredients and benefits.
customer_reviews.author: VivalaDittrich

customer_reviews.title: Best Facial Sprays!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these amazing Mario Badescu facial sprays an I love them! They smell sensational, they feel incredible, and you can use them for mixing powder masks as well as for facial mist! My face looks an feels rejuvenated, so soft an hydrated! I'm very satisfied with this purchase an I absolutely recommend these products! Iv tried alot of products from this company an they all are high quality an effective! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction ( read ingredients )
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is full of chemicals, as well as PEPpermint! Which made my face have an allergic reaction for days my face won't stop burning i can't wash it only oil cleanse this is terrible
customer_reviews.author: BenniPenni

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, refreshing - Will reorder!
customer_reviews.text: These smell great, and they do make me feel more hydrated and refreshed. I did not notice anything spectacular as far as using it as a setting spray (the bottle says you can do that), but I'll continue to use it on my face and hair throughout the day. Whether it works or not, I don't know. What I do know is it feels good, and it makes me feel great to use it so I'll keep doing that. I will probably re-order!
customer_reviews.author: Kessla S.

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals, do yourself a favor and buy a different rose water.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money- this is just a product with a lot of unnecessary hype. I used to use Mario Badescu's spot treatment as a teenager, because spas and dermatologist offices in New york city would carry them- so I would buy them but it never worked well for my skin. Similarly, this product is full of unnecessary chemicals that will dry out your skin, do yourself a favor and buy a different rose water that doesn't have all the additions.
customer_reviews.author: David Weisberg

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this is a hit!!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying Mario Badescu products for over a decade. They are top of the line and if they claim their product does it, you can guarantee it does what it says! I used the cucumber spray on my yoga clients as a refreshing mist while practicing outdoors. My clients always ask where I got this spray. It’d be a great Christmas gift or stocking stuffer. I really love beauty products, especially top quality like this one here.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Love these sprays for a short term fresh feeling
customer_reviews.text: I love these spritzers, I only wish that refreshed, dewy feeling lasted longer than five minutes. I have some spray primers and refresher spray that lasts way longer than these, but those sprays are also ten times more expensive. I’d say these sprays are great for a quick pick-me-up until you can get back to a location to freshen up. I do enjoy the scents and both feel great and don’t ruin your make up. I only wish I got the smaller bottles, since I use these as an “on-the-go” refreshing mist. Probably won’t purchase again but I’ll enjoy these big bottles for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Dia

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that they would be bigger in size, but they’re still decent. They are the legit bottles you would find at Ulta or anywhere else. Love that i bought them for a reasonable prize!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought these Mario Badescu sprays but lately I have been experimenting with other toners. I was so happy to have found these through Amazon. I love how it make my skin feel after use and not to mention the smell so lightly scented. The only issue I have (and I've seen alot of complaints here) is packaging security. The aloe spray was slightly unscrewed which caused some leaking... other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: On the fence with this one .... Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First of all I use this to refresh my make-up so I don't look powdery. What standed out immediately is that it doesn't spray evenly which is a shame. Big splotches of liquid sit on your face! I had to pour it into a small spray bottle I got from T-arget. I also don't think the pink option offers anything different than spraying your face with water. The green one is much nicer and gives me a nice glow. All in all I think NYX dewy is much better and will stick with that. Disappointing as I had high hopes for this.
customer_reviews.author: britgirl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the rose, but the green one is very perfumey and too strong for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D

customer_reviews.title: Can cause allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I dont get the hype. Im one of those that had a reaction. My skin started peeling off. I have patches of skin peeling off on my eyelids, my chin and around my mouth. I had a burning senstaion before the peeling happened as well and didnt think it could be this causing the trouble until i read the other reviews here. I wasn't using anything else new. I was hoping it ll be better than regualr rose water, but good god! Was i wrong! Im going back to my previous heritage rose water qith glycerin.
customer_reviews.author: vina

customer_reviews.title: Love these, especially the rose
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I especially like the rose scent, but both are wonderfully refreshing. I use both at home and at the office for regularly spritzing throughout the day. When I travel, I refill the rose (or both, if I'm going carry-on only) into a smaller, 100 mg, TSA 3-1-1 approved bottle, so I can take it on the plane and spray my face occasionally during long flights - or whenever I feel in need of 'fresh,' better-smelling air around me ;) I don't know about the purported benefits, but I think my skin has benefited, looking and feeling soft and moisturized, and every spray seems to invigorate my psyche (and make me smile) as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colored Ink

customer_reviews.title: Could smell it before evening opening the box
customer_reviews.text: The rosewater smells divine. Unfortunately, the containers are both not sealed. The rosewater leaked all over the inside of the box and 1/4 has already leaked out. They were inside little baggies and those baggies were wet as well. The top was slightly unscrewed. The other container appears intact but why no seal to ensure non-tampering or spillage during shipping/delivery? Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: chauncieR

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing! Such a nice pick-me-up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's so nice and light and refreshing! I keep one at home and one at work. The mist is fine enough that if you only do 1-2 spritzes, you can pat it into your face without ruining makeup, but substantial enough that with 3-4 spritzes it's like using a full daytime moisturizer. And cruelty free! I have been using this every day since I got it (I like the Rose better), and it's made my skin feel so much better in the dry winter air. I've recommended to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo’self  (these face mists are amazing)
customer_reviews.text: I’m a long time fan of the MB rose water face spray, but I’m so happy I purchased this combo. The green tea mist smells so so good! I keep the green tea mist by my bed for the evening and the rose mist in the bathroom for morning and makeup application. The rose is perfect for setting making and adding a nice dewy finish to your face. I apply about 5 sprays (lightly soak my whole face pretty much) after I do my foundation and contour. It blends everything together seamlessly and keeps my makeup put all day. Can’t say enough good things about these products.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is so great for the summer! I have mild rosacea on my face and also don't tolerate the heat very well so I love how refreshing and cooling this mist is. The cucumber and green tea one is very cooling and they both smell amazing but I prefer the green one. I use this several times a day and I think it also helps with my dry, flaky skin, especially before applying my moisturizer. It's not the cheapest stuff and I could probably make or find a similar product that would be a better value but for now, I don't mind spending the money on a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect middle of day pick me up
customer_reviews.text: While I do not like the rose scent (personal preference) it is still refreshing. The green tea scent is my go to gift for everyone. It is light and calming. While I do not feel it is very moisturizing it is a great pick me up throughout the day. I keep a bottle in my desk drawer at work and my purse, I like to use it when I need to remind myself to take a break and take a deep breath to regroup. This duo is a great purchase for those wanting to try and experience both scents.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing and it honestly prks better for my skin type ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the rose spray before but this is the first time I've tried the cucumber spray. I was curious and was pleasantly surprised. It smells amazing and it honestly prks better for my skin type than the rose. I still is the rose water spray for dampening my make up brushes and things but as far as a toner for my face I use the cucumber and it is amazing. The redness in my face has gone down and its so soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. A couple weeks ago, I started spraying the rose water on my beauty blender instead of using reg water and my face feels so much better with make up. I’ve seen these bottles many places over the past couple of years and never bought until I looked it up on amazon and read the reviews. Definitely worth the purchase. Great to keep in your purse or car for a quick face refresher. Will buy forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I cannot praise this product enough! I'm 39, and have always suffered from the "monthly" breakouts on my chin. I started using this after my daughter found it. I use first thing in the morning and at night after I wash my face. I spray on generously and let dry. I have not had ONE breakout in the last 7 months. I use the Aloe Vera (green one) aaaaaaaannnd mint daughter uses the rose water as a finishing spray and the same way I do. Beautiful skin guaranteed. I've gotten so many compliments, just great and it smells and feels great too. I've recommended this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angela G

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad, feels heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sprays to use as toners under hyaluronic acid serum. The rosewater spray has such an unpleasant scent that I wouldn't want anyone's nose in my neck while I'm wearing it. I couldn't stand myself while wearing it. The green tea spray is a little better, more neutral but still not a clean aroma. Neither spray makes my skin feels particularly refreshed; both feel heavy. I recommend passing on these and getting a straightforward, fresh cucumber hyaluronic spray.
customer_reviews.author: The Editor

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Read lots of reviews and mainly saw good but saw plenty of bad too. I have sensitive skin so I was so scared this would make my breakouts worse and such cuz that’s usually what happens. So far I’ve been using it for under (green) and over (pink) my makeup and when I take my makeup off my skin is actually smoother!! I wouldn’t say it’s helping with breakouts but it’s not causing any that I see....but worth it for softer skin.
customer_reviews.author: MoG

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing for all the lazy girls out there. I am NOT a morning person and it typically takes me a couple hours to feel like doing much if anything after my alarm goes off. This stuff is great for me because it’s quick to use in the morning. I just spray and go. It doesn’t moisturize nearly as well as an actual face lotion, but it gets the job done when I’d normally just go without. Both scents smell great and dry fairly quickly. It only takes a couple squirts for your entire face so I suspect the bottle will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Matney

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 10 years user of this products. The best toners ever in my humble opinion. The site MB put the shipping extremely high (more than the products) & I decided to search. Yes: this products are the real ones at a great price. Nothing is irregular & hydrate my skin ASAP. I’m so happy with the amount per price, the package but on other time I don’t want the shipping combination of products, this delay a lot the arrival. More than that: I highly recommended the products & the seller. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these because people rave about them
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these because people rave about them, but they irritated my skin and made me break out. I do prefer the cucumber one over the rose one. The cucumber smells fresh and clean while the rose is very, very fragrant. I did try to use them to set my makeup, but the particles are so large that it didn’t work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Rose Water - I spritz it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Rose Water - I spritz it on my beauty blender before blending in my concealer and it works great and helps the concealer to spread evenly. I also keep a compact sprayer in my purse to give my face a spritz whenever I feel dehydrated or want my makeup to last a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: LindsayBobJ

customer_reviews.title: Blue #1 Yellow #5 and lot more. Polysorbate 20 a known carcinogen. What?
customer_reviews.text: Read the ingredients, is Blue #1 and Yellow number #5 a great thing to spray on your face? Hmmmmm. Polysorbate 20 is derived from sorbitol, a natural ingredient. However, polysorbate 20 is not a natural ingredient. In fact, it is a carcinogen
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not a fine mist, nozzles need work
customer_reviews.text: These sprays seem fine to use if you are prepping your skin for a serum, but not to set makeup. The spray comes out of the nozzle unevenly, and not in a fine spray. Blotches your makeup because it can douse you. For this reason I am unable to use it as a refresher. It's fine if you are not wearing makeup. Not very moisturizing. Prefer pixi moisturizing milk to these sprays.
customer_reviews.author: amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all of the Mario sprays and they are an absolute dream for dry skin. After washing my skin I close my eyes and spray about 5 sprays and my skin just drinks it up. I have noticed that my skin is less red and my dry patches have improved drastically since purchasing. These would make a great gift for someone who likes skincare.
customer_reviews.author: larissa sperugia

customer_reviews.title: Fresh sparkling face!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered these facial sprays. There are zillions on the market and they all seem the same to me. I was wrong! The Mario Badescu Facial Spray with Rosewater & Facial Spray with Green Tea Duo are VERY different than the other facial; sprays I have tried. Both of these sprays leave my face tingling and looking and feeling brighter and fresher and more rosy! Im addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Love these sprays!
customer_reviews.text: I use about 8 pumps of either spray after washing my face, and then a few sprays throughout the day to refresh my skin on makeup free days! I have seasonal eczema and dryness - especially on my face and this spray combats my skin issues! I’ve had less breakouts than ever in my life, and my skin feels very hydrated! 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Gentle scent, happy skin :)
customer_reviews.text: Love both, though I'm partial to the rose. My skin feels so much happier & healthier. Scents are pleasant & not overwhelming, no feeling that I'm adding an impenetrable layer of insulation, which is important with hot flashes & dry skin. Love, love, love this.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Freshness Blended in a Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Modern makeup techniques often take too much time for mere mortals to use and get to work on time every day. Someone I admire a lot recommended this to me and gave it to me as a gift. Once I tried it, I have used it daily. It helps to set makeup and give a fresher more blended appearance without hours of layering and "baking". Hold the bottle at least 17 inches away from the face and spray lightly. You can use less makeup product and with this spray, the results will be slightly intensified and the makeup will have a more blended, fresh look.
customer_reviews.author: BK Littman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Adding these to my skin care routine is the best decision I’ve made. I have normal to dry skin so I use these in the morning to wake up and at night to relax. I especially love a spritz in the morning because it helps my face feel clean and hydrated, especially if I don’t have the time to wash my face! Personally, I like the cucumber scent better but both are pleasant and not overwhelming at all! I’ve also tried the lavender scent which is also nice and refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Gut

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, great for skin in the winter weather
customer_reviews.text: I tried one of the Mario Badescu facial sprays as a gift from a friend, and loved it right away. During the bitter cold and high winds, this line of facial mists kept my skin hydrated during the day without heavy creams or moisturizers. These mists also went along well with my other skincare routine products, and I would finish my cleansing and moisturizing with one of these mists. Simple, and cheaper than other products on the market. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Inwood

customer_reviews.title: Officially on the bandwagon with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ok ok, it's worth the hype. I'm in love with the sprays! I use the rose at night (cause I'm not into that girly rose scented kind of stuff and no one will know) and the other before and after my makeup. Makes my skin smoother and clearer and sets my makeup. Not as good as Skindinivia setting spray? But good enough for me. Occasionally I mix the Skindinivia halfsies with the Mario and make myself a super-spray of awesome tight-skinnedness. (these are all valid words, spellcheck).
customer_reviews.author: GMOH005

customer_reviews.title: Decent Duo!
customer_reviews.text: I think that overall this is a decent duo. The rosewater spray has a lovely, fresh scent and feel relatively moisturizing. The green tea spray, however, has a scent that is barely perceptible and doesn't seem very moisturizing. It does make your skin feel refreshed, though, so I give it the benefit of the doubt. I would've preferred that the green tea has a stronger, more refreshing natural fragrance, though.
customer_reviews.author: musicmuse

customer_reviews.title: Always stay stocked
customer_reviews.text: I’m always stocked on this product. I have dry skin so this is perfect for when my skin starts to dry out but I’ve already put makeup on. I used the aloe one after getting burnt and it reduced the amount of peeling I had to endure.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for an upcoming long haul flight so my skin didn't get dried out. Boy, do these smell awesome! The green tea reminds me of a soft aloe scent which is really refreshing. The rose water is so delicious smelling; my 12 year old daughter keeps stealing it from me! I'm not sure how moisturizing they really are to my face, but the cool spritz is very nice, and you smell great too. I won't offend the cabin with these. ;)
customer_reviews.author: AKM12321

customer_reviews.title: No wonder people are such fans of this product!
customer_reviews.text: This 2 pack is a great value. I needed makeup setting spray and since people use these just for that, I decided to give it a try. I’m glad I did because the product is refreshing. I keep a bottle by my bed at night. I’m not sure how great it is for setting makeup, I’ll try a few more times to see.
customer_reviews.author: FegelyTwinMommy

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: These facial sprays are wonderful. My face always feels fresh and clean after I use them and they both smell really good to the point where I would love to use these as a perfume. It has really helped cleanse my face and keep my acne away, which is awesome because I have terrible acne and oily skin. My skin feels and looks fresh and clean. These last a long time, but when I finish them, I'm definitely buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: These facial sprays are very moisturizing and refreshing. The cucumber is my favorite out of the 2 (the rose scent is a bit stronger than I would like in the other spray). I deducted a star because I think it would be nice if the bottles were packaged with some sort of tamper-proof seal.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive setting spray with added skincare benefits
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to this product! I will stray to try a drugstore setting spray—it will do the job but then I come back to this and ask myself why I ever stopped using it. I use it sometimes as a refresher throughout the day but most often only as setting spray. Even when I’m just spraying it over makeup my skin tends to look better when I take my makeup off. More even tone and hydrated. I have the most sensitive skin and this always babies it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Received an empty bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. When it arrived one of he bottles was empty. The rose water (pink) spray had leaked completely out in shipping. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I thought
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product, but I would not purchase it again. I was expecting a fine spray mist, but the spray comes out in large blobs. Maybe this particular sprayer was received malfunctioning. Spray seems perfumey and sticky. Don't get it on your lips, bad taste.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth z.

customer_reviews.title: Good facial spray for the $
customer_reviews.text: Both smell great. Refreshing and moisturizing. It doesnt mske be break out at all & I have sensitive skin. Great price. The only neg. thing is the ingredients list is HUGE, including scary things like Sodium Benzonate & 2 things I can't pronounce. The rest of the ingredients are all natural & no parabens.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I ordered the duo in order to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I ordered the duo in order to prepare for the summer in hot Houston. It works great and I use it in the morning right after shower and before my face lotion, I also use it during evening while at the office and I need to refresh my face. My husband also uses it when he has been exposed to the sun as his skin is very pale. Is light, non sticky and has a fresh aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Iris08

customer_reviews.title: Works good to give the flower below a fresh smell not good on face
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely too scented for your face. I think all the fragrances irritated my skin because it caused a breakout immediately after use. They do smell amazing though the rose water smells just like roses so I’ve found good use for it and I use it on my bikini area and it gives the flower below a beautiful rose smell Without the burning of alcohol 😆 bf approved.... so I would say definitely a no for facial regime because of fragrance but great for hygiene regime (do not spray inside vigina please lol only outter bikini area 👍🏽)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like both scents but I didn't know how much I was going to love the rosewater one! It feels nice and hydrating and the smell is so good I want to spray it as often as I can LOL. I like having the two pack so I can have one in my purse and one in the bathroom. I'll probably enjoy the cucumber spray more in the summertime but I plan to buy more of the rosewater one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaOG

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: My face always feels fresher after using these. I definitely like the cucumber one more than the rose water one, but they both smell great. I personally tried using it over my makeup once like some people said, but didn’t like it much. I have dryer skin so I wouldn’t use it as a solo moisturizer but if you have normal-oily skin it’s probably perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to more expensive toners, this set was a bargain. I preferred the Aloe and Cucumber facial spray. The fragrance of Aloe, Herb and Rosewater is not pleasing to me--obviously a personal preference. I now know that I can access two bottles of the Cucumber spray and will definitely purchase again. Just as effective as a toner that cost $20 for only one of the same size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Roark12

customer_reviews.title: This product is legit.
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews before ordering. Some were good some were bad. I know there was some concern regarding authenticity. Mine came right on time and were legit. I’m very pleased with how they both smell and make my skin feel. I have facial atopic dermatitis and the smallest things cause my skin to go into a frenzy but, I am very happy to say this is the best my skin has felt in my whole 23 years. I will be purchasing again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: The green tea one is fantastic. Rose water is great for refreshing through out the day.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this stuff. I buy the two of these because my daughter uses the Rose water and I use the green tea. I normally break out and have bumpy skin. Lately. My skin feels fresh. Looks less splotchy. Smells great too. I use green tea before makeup. But will use the rose water too through out the day and then finish with green tea before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Chattaway

customer_reviews.title: My personal favorite is the green because it feels so refreshing and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knowing I would be spending majority of my summer outside with children, running and playing. My personal favorite is the green because it feels so refreshing and has a crisper/cleaner scent. I love spraying on my face after getting out of the pool when my skin feels dry from the chlorine!
customer_reviews.author: Dana W.

customer_reviews.title: Not really moisturizing but great.
customer_reviews.text: So this isn’t exactly moisturizing BUT if you put it on a bare face it’ll make your skin sticky like a primer. I use it as a primer and as a setting spray. The make up really absorbes the product leaving a glowing effect. It’s also great to use after having make up on for so long. It makes the make up look freshly put on. Love the smell of it my personal favorite is the green one.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a cucumber one in Nordstroms used it my entire vacation in PR would spray it to keep face hydrated and gives you a glow. So decided to order the rose one and cucumber set...I use the rose under my lotion and as a primer after lotion and jade rolling I use the cucumber and as a setting spray after makeup...
customer_reviews.author: M-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is toner. Not magic water. If you are not washing your face or doing face masks, then yes using this you will see a big difference. I did not.
customer_reviews.author: ck115

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent
customer_reviews.text: The smell of both of these are heavenly. They both make my face itchy while drying but maybe that’s just me. Haven’t noticed any difference in moisture of my skin or texture/color etc or my skin but I’ve only been using them less than a week. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: BAugust

customer_reviews.title: Great for EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Love both of these sprays so much. The rosewater-aloe spray is so nice in the hot summer months all over my body. Recently used this for a healing tattoo and it moisturized in ways that I could never use lotion for. Even nicer to use after sun-exposure. The Green Tea spray is fantastic as a toner. I use it every morning and sometimes at night to help remove any makeup reside. Leaves my skin feeling clean without being tight.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the middle about these. I am still using them, but I’m not really sure they’re doing anything. I use the green one as soon as I get out of the shower before my normal moisturizer. I use the pink one throughout the day when I feel the need. My face is dry so I think the pink one works better.
customer_reviews.author: Tish R

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for great skincare at an extremely affordable price? This is it! This facial spray has high quality skincare ingredients. It has an amazing scent. One is rose scented and the other has a more spa like smell of aloe and green tea. It is very hydrating and refreshing. I like to use this spray before I apply my moisturizer and after I wash my face at night. It can also be used to set your makeup in place. I highly recommend this product! 10/10!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I don't notice any real hydration going on
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I've been sold perfume water for my face. It's all fragrance, little hydration once it mostly evaporates. I can't imagine any of the ingredients is really making a difference besides the green tea. Oh whale, at least my face smells nice after a little spray boost in the middle of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Spray is toooooo heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed by the sprayer. It is a very dense spray, not a mist, as it should be. Honestly, I didn't feel any difference in moisturizing or feeling refreshed. The scent is so light I can barely smell it. I will not buy it again. I hope they will take it back. Was not worth the $'s.
customer_reviews.author: Susan England

customer_reviews.title: Just a face mist.
customer_reviews.text: You can make your own missed with concentrated watermelon and water. I thought this was a toner but it's really just something to put on your face whenever you feel like you've been sweaty all day, doesn't really do anything else.
customer_reviews.author: -Dania

customer_reviews.title: Invigorating and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the cucumber/ green tea better than the rosewater. Both have pleasant, fresh but the cucumber/green tea feels invigorating. I always use one of these before putting on moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: GetSet

customer_reviews.title: Drying
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hydrating mist but if anything, this makes my face feel more dry and tight after applying it. Now I understand why people like this as a makeup setting spray but it is not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Pria

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh such a relaxing mist. Like being at a spa in the middle of my crowded bathroom with my screaming toddler hanging onto my legs. No really, I love these toners and my skin looks and feels fabulous after using them. I have combination and sensitive skin but Mario Badescu always works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte.

customer_reviews.title: Facial Spray
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite product!! I hate face moisturizers because of my oily skin type. This is perfect for after a shower, before bed, getting out of the pool and under my make-up. Very soothing. It also has a nice light scent. Started buying this for for my 12yr old daughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: The shopper

customer_reviews.title: Leaky package
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item and when it cane there bag was leaking. Opened package and the green tea was empty and the Rose was 1/2 full. Went online and requested replacement. Received the new order today and both the rose and green tea were empty the package left a mark in my deck so I knew as soon as I opened it it would be empty or leaking. I’ll take the refund and gladly send the empty bottles back! Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: kwoerner

customer_reviews.title: It burns
customer_reviews.text: After reading the positive reviews I feel like I have the wrong product. I’ve tried using the slow one and besides smelling like potpourri, it’s burns and turns my skin red. I have to wash it off. And I couldn’t imagine putting it on under makeup. It’s definitely not something I would ever buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It feels and smells and tastes like I’m spraying hairspray on my face. I basically wasted $24 but realized these products are cheap because they are worthless for facial health and I won’t be purchasing anymore. I will definitely spend more money on better products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff since sliced bread!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something that works! My skin was so dry and uneven. After 4 kids my face really took a beating. After one use of this my face looked better, and after a month I don't even wear makeup anymore! I never ever used to leave the house without makeup! Do yourself a favor and keep this on hand! I use the aloe one in the am and the rose water one in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This spray is amazing. I bought it for wife, but she let me use it a few times. It feels amazing on your face after a shower! IT moisturizes well and has a nice smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Voglin

customer_reviews.title: Light and Delightful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for the rose water, but I absolutely love the cucumber water! I bought two sets, one for my daughter, and she loves the rose water. Highly recommend this product as I have tried several brands of rose water. These are a little lighter than most, but the scents are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn M.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product. Using a few spritz morning /night after cleansing routine. Feel hydrated and fresh. Also use water make up application to set make up. Can use throughout the day regardless of wearing make up to add moisture and peek up skin as well as mood.
customer_reviews.author: Asaad

customer_reviews.title: Light clean scent and feels amazing on my skin - would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I don't have very problematic skin but I have been using both of these sprays AM + PM and have noticed a visible change to the brightness and glow of my skin. Light clean scent and feels amazing on my skin - would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY spray I'll use. It serves all of it's purposes perfectly. 1. As a toner after cleansing 2. As a refresher 3. As a setting spray I won't buy anything else. I love this spray! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LeSpicyBrownCowTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scents, Not Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I like both the scents. It is refreshing for the moment you spray, but not for long after (I live in a very cold, very dry climate.) I didn’t feel especially moisturized from it, but it left my skin smelling nice, but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaStar

customer_reviews.title: Add these to your beauty routine
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of both of these; so natural. They are both very moisturizing and the spray bottle is good quality. I have had other face sprays that’s don’t mist well, they squirt product more than spray it. These ones give you a nice mist,so within 2-3 sprays your face feels evenly coated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love rosewater and use it often for my rosacea I also like using it to set my make up I’m looking forward to using the cucumber water for summertime to cool me down after being in the sun
customer_reviews.author: B Austin

customer_reviews.title: Leaves sticky residue!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so bad, it made my skin red. When it arrived it was leaking all over the place due to the cap was not twisted tightly. After applying it makes my face all sticky and I do wash my face before applying it and it still leaves a sticky residue! Don't buy it it's a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Connie .S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s my 2nd purchase and I love it. I use it on my clean washes wash and hair and my skin is super soft and clear. My skin is oily and this product makes my skin looks normal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Skin care routine
customer_reviews.text: The aloe spray did wonders for my skin before and when I ran out of it my skin became dry once I stopped using it! Very hydrating and very acne friendly when it came to my skin! It looks like the picture and the original bottle! I got some small samples as well!
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these products! I use it before makeup, after makeup, before bed, pretty much any time of day. It’s so light weight you can get away with it. The green bottle is very cooling and wakes you up, & the pink bottle smells like flowers. Coming from someone who has combination skin, definitely buy it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: I love BOTH of these facial sprays
customer_reviews.text: I love BOTH of these facial sprays!! I have sensitive skin, and have never had an issue with using either scent/formula. They smell great & feel amazing on! I use them at least twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ducati821

product_meta.title: Mario Badescu Facial Spray Herbs/Rosewater and Cucumber/Green Tea, 4 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description:
This set includes (1) 4 Oz Bottle of Our Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater and (1) 4 Oz Bottle of Our Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber & Green Tea. The Aloe Herbs & Rosewater is a refreshing, hydrating mist to use anywhere anytime. Simply formulated with fragrant herbal extracts and rosewater for a pleasant, pick me up for dehydrated, tight and uncomfortable skin. Spray your day and night creams for a boost of hydration or use it to set makeup or spray on dry hair throughout the day. Safe for all skin types. Gentle, non-irritating. The Aloe, Cucumber and Green Tea invigorates dull, tired skin with an infusion of Cucumber and Peppermint Essential Waters. This facial mist delivers a cooling boost of hydration as Green Tea provides powerful antioxidant protection – leaving the skin feeling refreshed and revitalized. HOW TO USE: Mist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to infuse more hydration before or after applying moisturizer, as a pick-me-up on the go, or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

BRAND STORY
Simple, gentle, effective skin care is our philosophy—and for that we’ve earned the reputation of being an editor favorite and celebrity go-to worldwide. MARIO BADESCU SKIN CARE IS SKIN CARE FOR ALL.
